p:
Table 1 gives the ranges of the model parameters used for LHS. Ranges of parameters controlling contact and partnership dynamics ( ρ, c, and c
e / c
w ) are taken from Champredon et al. [ 15], whereas those controlling infection ( β
P , D
P , β
D , and D
D ) are taken from Hollingsworth et al. [ 16]. The remaining parameter values are taken from Shirreff et al. [ 9].
